pageContext.claim: “And by the way, now their countries take them back [referring to undocumented immigrants with crime records]. They weren't taking them back. … We'll bring them back to Guatemala, Honduras, El Salvador, Mexico. We bring them back. They didn't used to take them.”
pageContext.analysis: In fact, the Obama administration prioritized the deportations of gang members and individuals with criminal records. Thousands of such migrants were returned to El Salvador, Guatemala and Honduras during the Obama administration, according to statistics from the Department of Homeland Security.
